channel.title: FHFA pilot program on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in FHFA pilot program on FinanClub

item.title: FNMA
item.description: score:71 Chances: Fannie Mae’s Home Purchase Sentiment Index has increased for the third consecutive month, indicating growing optimism among consumers towards home-selling conditions. The company’s issuance of approximately $751 million in notes under its benchmark issuance program, CAS, demonstrates strong investor confidence in Fannie Mae’s credit risk sharing on its single-family conventional guaranty book of business.
